snippet.title: American Truck Simulator - Missouri Video Trailer
snippet.description:
Get ready to explore & haul a variety of loads through Missouri in American Truck Simulator which releases on April 3rd. Whether you choose to deliver to iconic cities like St. Louis or take the back roads to explore the state's stunning natural landmarks, including the Mississippi River and the Ozark Mountains, Missouri has something for everyone.

Add it to your Steam Wishlist TODAY!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2730870/American_Truck_Simulator__Missouri/
